relation: Darrow5 - #39 Thanks to his carelessness, Poo is rewarded with a very rare item. Unfortunately for Jeff, this will only prove to be a bad influence on Ness. ...Apparently Jeff isn't quite as reckless as he thought.
Darrow5 - #38 Thanks to Paula, a magical rainbow somehow saves the group from smashing into the ground below. Also, it brings pancakes. Heavenly pancakes.
Darrow5 - #37 Remember, look before you leap. There's no telling when you may fall down a bottomless pit filled with whoosh lines.
Darrow5 - #36 With another sanctuary saved, the gang prepares for their next destination. Preferably without having to hear any more from Thunder & Storm.
Darrow5 - #35 After stepping onto Pink Cloud, Ness discovers yet another melody. Also, possibly some sort of brain tumor.
textBeforeTable: > T P M G F B A < Other Submissions by Darrow Although the initial trip of getting the contacts and socks may have seemed like a filler trip, there was a reason for it all along.
